title: International group praises green revival
summary: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

summary: Authorities on the isolated island chain near Japan had earlier imposed a 10-liter gasoline limit per customer.

summary: The Prosecutor General’s Office accused IBO of “distorting well-known facts, spreading anti-Russian propaganda and fomenting interethnic discord.”

title: French wine exporters 'hugely disappointed' over US tariff exemption failure
summary: (KPL/AFP) The French wine exporters federation said Thursday it was "hugely disappointed" by the European Union's admission that it failed to secure a tariff exemption for the sector in the US-EU trade deal.
